name: CMGT_QR_getTaskAssignmentHistory
description: QR to get task assignment history
sail_code:
rule!CMGT_UTIL_QueryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: a!defaultValue(
    ri!sortInfo,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.createdOn,
      ascending: false()
    )
  ),
  filters: {
    ri!additionalFilters,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.assignmentRuleId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!assignmentRuleId,
      applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!assignmentRuleId)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.assignmentVersion,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!assignmentVersion,
      applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!assignmentVersion)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.role.roleTypeId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!roleTypeId,
      applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!roleTypeId)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.taskBehaviorTypeId,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!taskBehaviorTypeId,
      applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!taskBehaviorTypeId)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.routingType,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!routingType,
      applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!routingType)
    )
  },
  fields: {
    ri!fields,
    recordType!CMGT_TaskAssignmentHistory.role
  },
  logicalExpressions: ri!additionalLogicalExpressions,
  groupByFields: ri!groupByFields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
)
